duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop data pipelines on-premise and in the cloud.
Analyze, define, and document system requirements for data, workflow, logical processes, and reporting requirements.
Support the creation of new cloud infrastructure and data ecosystem.
Create and maintain functional and technical specifications documents.
Design, implement, and manage data pipelines to deliver data for applications, reporting, or analytics.
Develop, implement, and manage end-to-end data solutions.
Create test plans, test data sets, and perform automated testing to ensure system components meet specifications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or higher Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent experience.
